articles.description: The month of selling has come after FPIs were net buyers every month between March and August.

articles.author: Abhimanyu Sharma
articles.title: India's food regulator wants you to stop packing food in newspapers to avoid health risks - CNBCTV18
articles.description: FSSAI said newspapers are often subjected to various environmental conditions, making them susceptible to contamination by pathogens that may transfer to food.
